posts.title: Update of His Majesty s State Visit to Vietnam: A Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) on Air Servic...
posts.description: Update of His Majesty s State Visit to Vietnam: A Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) on Air Services Agreement was signed on August 19, 2025 between the Ministry of Infrastructure and Transport, Bhutan and the Civil Aviation Authority, Ministry of Construction, The Government of the Socialist Republic of Viet Nam in the presence of His Majesty The King and the President of Viet Nam. The objective of the MoU is to promote aeronautical relations in a spirit of cooperation and understanding for the benefit of both countries. #Update #energy #Aviation
posts.content: Update of His Majesty s State Visit to Vietnam: A Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) on Air Services Agreement was signed on August 19, 2025 between the Ministry of Infrastructure and Transport, Bhutan and the Civil Aviation Authority, Ministry of Construction, The Government of the Socialist Republic of Viet Nam in the presence of His Majesty The King and the President of Viet Nam. The objective of the MoU is to promote aeronautical relations in a spirit of cooperation and understanding for the benefit of both countries. #Update #energy #Aviation

posts.title: Just in: The Supreme Court upheld the earlier rulings, confirming Tashi Dorji s conviction for a ...
posts.description: Just in: The Supreme Court upheld the earlier rulings, confirming Tashi Dorji s conviction for a fourth-degree felony and affirming the High Court s sentence of three years and four months in prison. The verdict was passed today. The former MP Tashi Dorji of Nubi_Tangsibji consituency in Trongsa was charged for molesting a child in 2022. The incident occurred when he was serving as a Gewog Administrative Officer. The case was filed in court in October last year.
posts.content: Just in: The Supreme Court upheld the earlier rulings, confirming Tashi Dorji s conviction for a fourth-degree felony and affirming the High Court s sentence of three years and four months in prison. The verdict was passed today. The former MP Tashi Dorji of Nubi_Tangsibji consituency in Trongsa was charged for molesting a child in 2022. The incident occurred when he was serving as a Gewog Administrative Officer. The case was filed in court in October last year.
